about_the_game:
In the world of Túatha, a Cairn marks a place of significance, a tribute to those who have passed, or a beacon of support to those who continue onward.

The Village: Cairn DLC unlocks the Cairn badge and description on the main menu, a modest way of showing your support for Túatha Echoes: The Village.

This DLC *Does Not* expand or affect the story of The Village.

content_descriptors.notes: A horror setting dealing with Eldrich/Lovecraft-like psychological horror including wide-scale torment and death with suggestions of physical and psychological torture and gruesome murders in the story text but *not* in images.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 64bit with SSE2 instruction set support
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DX10 (shader model 4.0) or comparable
  • DirectX: Version 10
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 64bit with SSE2 instruction set support
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DX12 or comparable
  • DirectX: Version 12
